articles.description: A rare phenomenon that could hold the key to physics beyond the Standard Model.
articles.content: The Standard Model predicts that two top quark-antiquark pairs can combine to form four top quarks at once. Four-top-quark production is tricky because the production rate is thought to be 70,000 tim… [+2042 chars]

articles.title: LED water bottles, smart lunch boxes, battery-operated sharpeners and more smart accessories for school kids - Gadgets Now

articles.content: The electric stationery set includes -- an electric automatic pencil sharpener, electric Eraser with 10 refills, a desktop vacuum cleaner, a stapler and a hole puncher. The sharpener is suitable for … [+200 chars]
